title: Nut Dish And Cover, "Ambassador", 1926
provenance: Estate of Agnes M. Carpenter, New York, NY
dimensions:
Overall H x W x diam.: 13.4 x 7.3 x 7.6 cm (5 1/4 x 2 7/8 x 3 in.)
Base H x W x diam.: 6.8 x 7.3 x 7.6 cm (2 11/16 x 2 7/8 x 3 in.)
Top H x W x diam.: 6.9 x 7.3 x 7.6 cm (2 11/16 x 2 7/8 x 3 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Thin-walled, clear glass; a) hemispherical bowl supported by thin stem on flat, circular foot; b) domed cover with spherical knop on stem; rim of cover retracted, to fit snuggly in bowl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Nut Dish And Cover, "Ambassador", 1926.
1926. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1958-98-27-a,b.
